page.title: 01Strete village,introduction
page.content: { Strete}is a village(SX842468) overlooking Start Bay,built upon Dartmouth slates.As the name suggests the settlement is basically one long street on the Dartmouth-Kingsbridge road.Though a long established village, in recent years a change in character has occurred with a larger population but loss of services and {"community spirit". } Life-long inhabitant, Mrs.Parnell, believes the community spirit was destroyed in the 1960's when an estate of seventy bungalows was built,in the 1980's a further thirtyfive flats were added.The new inhabitants were mainly retired people, who have altered the age structure of the village.As a consequence only about 30% of the villagers are of working age & only 12 to 15 children of school age.Many new villagers have their own transport.
